Amazing home! Would definitely stay here again.

Amazing and gorgeous place. Loved the house and would stay any time again.

We had an awesome weekend at a beautiful place. You can tell it was newly remodeled and they had great taste in all the finishing touches. Beautiful lake, great scenery would recommend this place to anybody looking to get away for the week or weekend.

This was our third visit to Jacksonville and, as usual, we had a great stay at Charley's place. The house is nice, comfortable and clean, and has all you need for a great stay. The lake was full, so we had a great time fishing, kayaking and canoeing. We need to start planning our next visit!
We are appreciative for our peaceful stay, and enjoyed immensely. Every aspect of our stay worked perfectly and gave us what we were looking for!!

We had a wonderful stay! We quickly understood why Charley and his family call the lake house their "happy place." It became our "happy place" too while we were there, and we were sad to leave at the end of it! The house is tucked away among a forest of tall trees and pines, making it feel very private and secluded. It sits right on a lake and the views are breathtaking.
